name: edge-manifest
description: EDGE-MANIFEST: A bun-based monorepo for Cloudflare Workers

scripts.generate: bun run build:packages && node packages/@edge-manifest/cli/dist/src/bin.js setup --out-dir packages/@edge-manifest/starter/.output --force
scripts.build:packages: bun run build:core && bun run build:generators && bun run build:cli && bun run build:sdk && bun run build:admin-ui
scripts.build: bun run generate && bun run build:packages && cd packages/@edge-manifest/starter && bun run build
scripts.dev: bun run generate && cd packages/@edge-manifest/starter && bun run dev
scripts.migrate:prod: bun run generate && cd packages/@edge-manifest/starter && bun run migrate:prod
scripts.deploy: bun run build && cd packages/@edge-manifest/starter && bun run deploy
